items.title: Microsoft Excel Formulas [ For Office Use ]
items.headline: Learn 18 Basic Excel Formulas in 45 minutes like Vlook Up , Hlook Up, Match , Index , Match , Concatenation and more.
objectives_summary: Enrolled students will learn 18 basic excel formulas in 45 minutes. Students will have the complete knowledge of all the 18 excel formulas on where to be applied and how to be applied.
Example of few Formulas learnt in this course are : Hlook up , Vlook up, Match Function, Index and much more.
Students will have a firm grip on excel.
